notes_display: In Historical Sketches of the Paper Currency of the American Colonies by Henry Phillips, Jr. (1865). Given to Dr. Jesse C. Green in 1890. Leaf 56BB.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: red and black ink, EIGHTEEN PENCE. THIS BILL shall pass current for
issue_obverse_legend_s: ONE SHILLING and SIX PENCE, according to an Act of GENERAL ASSEMBLY of the Common-Wealth of Pennsylvania, passed the Twentieth Day of March, in the Year One Thousand Seven Hundred and Seventy-seven. Dated the Tenth Day of April, A. D. 1777. EIGHTEEN PENCE
issue_reverse_legend_s: Eighteen Pence. | To Counterfeit is DEATH. PHILADELPHIA: Printed by JOHN DUNLAP. 1777.
